A SPORTS CONSULTING &
PLAYER DEVELOPMENT AGENCY

We love the game and the work we do. We work closely with our clients to develop player intelligence, pressure resistant skills, and patterns

About Us

We offer sports consulting services that are designed to take players, coaches, and teams to the next level. We have developed players that have been selected for European U18 national field hockey teams

You can the see the deep knowledge that the staff passes on to players at our Field Hockey Fundamentals Face book group with over 9,000 members, including current and former Olympic coachesField Hockey Fundamentals

PAST RESULTS

We have developed 5 players that have been selected for 3 different European U18 national field hockey teams.

We coached the USA West u18 and U19 teams at the junior national championships.

We have coached a boys team which won a U14 boys national championship in Italy with a small club..

We have coached a boys team which finished second twice in a U16 boys national championship in Italy with a small club.

We have coached a girls team which qualified for the U14 and U16 girls national championship in Italy with a small club. The best finish was thrid place.

We have coached a senior women's team which won the senior women's national championship in Serbia.

View Works

Our Services

We offer sports consulting services that are designed to take players, coaches, and teams to the next level.

We design training programs custom taliored to the needs of the players, coaches, and teams which we serve. For players we assess the player's current levels of game intelligence, skills, and understanding and ability to execute patterns. For coaches we consult on training programs and strategy. For teams we work on developing better understanding between players, with a focus on attacking and defensive patterns of play and scoring.

Player Intelligence

We teach the 6 step player intelligence model using real training on the field. Perception, conception, decision, deception, execution, and assessment

Offensive Skills

Basic, intermediate, and advanced skills are taught with a focus on biomechanics, footwork, posture, and game situation to use the skills.

Defensive Skills

Defensive skills are taught with an emphasis on tackling, marking, channeling/shadowing, and tackling in pairs.

Offensive patterns

Offensive patterns are taught for defensive, miodfield and attacking buildup play as well as plays designed to generate shots on goal

Defensive Patterns

Defensive patterns are taught which include defensive formations, organization, and running lines.

Drag flick training

The biomechanics and footwork of the drag flick are taught in stages. See the Drag Flack book for an idea of the depth of training.

Formations, tactics, and Strategy

Customized formations, tactics, and strategy are developed for teams based on level, opposition, and the desired style of play

We work with players, teams and coaches.
